A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I can't even begin to sum up everything wrong with this movie. It is far and away the worst movie since the Phantom Menace\, and it MAY be worse. I literally never bother to review movies\, but this trash was so bad I just had to add my 2 cents to the pile. 

To put this into context\, I'm a lifelong StarWars fan. I adored Rogue One. The only StarWars movie better than Rogue One is Empire\, but that's a given of course.

Half of The Last Jedi is uninspiring drivel either on a little island or on some stupid ship. The characters do a bunch of nothing which leads to more nothing. There's a ton of CGI animals thrown in to try and make you forget nothing is happening. After the nothing\, there is almost a light-saber fight that is almost interesting and character building\, but then it becomes more nothing. The movie ends with some kid holding a mop. It's suppose to be deep\, but it's really more nothing. 

If you're a fan of StarWars\, skip this. If you're a fan of good writing\, character building\, characters with agency... really if you're a fan of things that are good\, skip this.
